bowt.cmnd

Class CommandCooldown

  • java.lang.Object
    • bowt.cmnd.CommandCooldown

  • public class CommandCooldown
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which handles a cooldown for a single Command.

    Basic implementation

    A normal implementation would look something like this:

    Assuming that BasicCommand extends Command. 

     Command command = new BasicCommand(new String[]{"help"}, UserPermissions.USER);
 
 new CommandCooldown(command, 5000).startTimer();

    This will make the command unusable for 5 seconds.

    Author:
    ⋈

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandCooldown

        public CommandCooldown(Command command,
                       long cooldown)
        Creates a new instance for the given command with the given cooldown.
        Parameters:
        command - The command for which this instance handles the cooldown.
        cooldown - The wanted cooldown is milliseconds.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommand

        public Command getCommand()
        Gets the Command that this instance is handling the cooldown for.
        Returns:
        The command.

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer()
        Starts the timer for the set command.

        This will set Command.onCooldown to true and change it back to false once the timer is finished.
